alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Major (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 01 at 4:24PM CDT until June 01 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Blaine County in northwestern Oklahoma... Southeastern Major County in northwestern Oklahoma... * Until 445 PM CDT. * At 424 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles north of Okeene, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fairview, Okeene, Ames, Isabella, and Homestead. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
